column1: The Pit Room////I don't care what "best of" list you look at - to me
column2: this is the best BBQ in Texas.  The brisket has a good bark and moist taste
column3: the pork ribs come right off the bone
column4: and the turkey is outstanding (I rarely order turkey).  Sides are pretty good
column5: and the cole slaw is a vinegar-based version.  The pricing is actually less than other "best of" places here in the Houston area.  Great for a lunch during the work week as well as grabbing a few pounds to go.
